type.description: loading, with optional values of 'circle', 'wave', 'cube', 'rect' disappear
type.description_zh: loading 的类型，可选值为 `circle` `wave` `cube` `rect` disappear

size.description: The size of loading, which can be 'large' 'normal' 'small' mini
size.description_zh: loading 的大小，可选值为 `large` `normal` `small` mini

loading.description: Whether or not loading is displayed when content exists
loading.description_zh: 存在内容时 loading 是否显示

radius.description: If the type of loading is 'circle', you can set its radius size
radius.description_zh: loading 的类型为 `circle` 时，可设置其半径大小
